Description_lang: For $340541d after shifting into Bear Form, your health and armor are increased by $s1%.

description_blz.en_US: For 4 sec after shifting into Bear Form, your health and armor are increased by 15%.
description_blz.es_MX: Durante 4 s después de asumir tu Forma de oso, tu salud y tu armadura aumentan un 15%.
description_blz.pt_BR: Por 4 s após assumir a Forma de Urso, você ganha 15% de Armadura e pontos de vida.
description_blz.de_DE: Nach dem Wechsel in die Bärengestalt werden Eure Gesundheit und Eure Rüstung für 4 Sek. um 15% erhöht.
description_blz.en_GB: For 4 sec after shifting into Bear Form, your health and armor are increased by 15%.
description_blz.es_ES: Durante 4 s, tras adoptar forma de oso, tu salud y armadura aumentan un 15%.
description_blz.fr_FR: Pendant 4 s après avoir adopté votre forme d’ours, vos points de vie et votre Armure sont augmentés de 15%.
description_blz.it_IT: Per 4 s dopo aver mutato in Forma d'Orso, la salute massima e l'armatura aumentano del 15%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Когда вы принимаете облик медведя, ваш запас здоровья и прочность брони увеличиваются на 15% на 4 сек.
description_blz.ko_KR: 곰 변신 후 4초 동안 생명력과 방어도가 15%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 變形為熊形態後的4秒內，生命力和護甲值提高15%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 在变为熊形态之后的4秒内，你的生命值和护甲提高15%。
